name: Brick Crush-Power Breaker
description: Brick balls is funny and challenging brick game!The newest addiction comes!   Play ballz to smash the bricks and relax your brain , easy to play, challenge to master！Master game play:+ Touch the screen , move the ball to aim by finger.+ Swipe to release the balls, to wipe out all brick.+ Catch split and bounce effective items. Break as many bricks as possible to win the highest scores that pass the levels.Game Features:+Free to play!+Unlock new balls with special skills!+140+ Levels of limitless fun!+ Offline: Play without  wifi!+easy to control!+relax your brain in balls bricks puzzle game!Just play Bricks Crush Balls to relax your brain and get funHey guys! Swipe the balls to destroy all the bricks with us NOW!!
